amendment.description: To clarify the types of losses to be studied, to require appearances before Congress, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1221 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1221 proposed by Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S7777; text: CR S7777) To clarify the types of losses to be studied, to require appearances before Congress, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1221 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1221 proposed by Senator Levin.
